item.description: Hi, Adil here I am a Computer Science student at National Universty of Science & Technology. I did my Intermediate from GCU, Lahore. So far, I have studied programming language such as C, C++ and Java. I have also learned a little bit of Adobe XD Adobe Illustrator Adobe Photoshop. My Interests are in : Web development UI UX Designing Graphic Designing Photography You can check out my Photography here.
Contact me You can contact me via email. Email Address : adilshahid193@gmail.com

Latest Post Building an 64-bit Operating System Here, I will elaborate you guys that how to make an operating system. For this we need almost three softwares including: Docker VS code QEMU For step by step guide of QEMU installation, click here. Procedure i. Installing the Softwares First of all, you need to install all these three softwares.
